text: how does the workflow current know which page the form is being submitted from?

<@U3A4KEWK1> We've accomplished that by using hubdb and jquery to input the page title (or any other information) into hidden fields and using workflows to push notifications to whom they should go to.

<@U22PJPGK0> They start with "when x form is submitted on y page", with y page being whatever blog post it's on. So, there's a workflow for each event. Just didn't know if you could also target dynamic pages that way.
And yeah I figured I might have to do something like populating hidden fields. Not super elegant, but I guess it works.
